name: The Bounty Hunter Phoenix Dio and the Triple Hunt
name_original: The Bounty Hunter Phoenix Dio and the Triple Hunt
description: In this short game the player followers the space bounty hunter, Phoenix Dio, as he tracks down one of three bounties in a bustling space port. Each hunt will be a life or death struggle that forces our hero to come face to face with not just his prey, but the ghosts of his own past.
